short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to stream your desktop into meetings with Jitsi Meet and Jitsi Videobridge on LinkedIP's cloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow your Chrome browser to share your screen through our video bridge and conference rooms.  You may use it to select which screen you want to share or which particular window.
